max-preview.description: Maximize or restore the preview pane

mount.description: A mount manager for Yazi, providing disk mount, unmount, and eject functionality

smart-enter.description: files or  directories all in one key

smart-filter.description: A Yazi plugin that makes filters smarter: continuous filtering, automatically enter unique directory, open file on submitting
